title: Plat-Dia Team lf a Coach to improve
body:
Info about Team: 

ELO: PLAT 5 - DIA 4
COUNTRY: All are Austrian's, life near each other and have a good friendship in rl
AGE: 18-24

We play most likely ESL Ladder/Tournaments and Dynamic Que and basicly every LAN in Austria.

We got sponsoring and organisation behind us.
Trust Gaming
http://www.esennstal.at/

What we expect:

Deep gameknowledge.
Experience at coaching 
bring new Ideas to the team

If things go well and we feel that we are improving of your coaching payment is posible.



Any Questions?
IGN: ESE Gamehunter
SKYPE: ferdl94 / Kevin Rehrl
